trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around May 29th 0001
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the backyard laying on a trampoline with my girlfriend, we were talking, looking up at the sky. three tiny white objects started to pass overhead, almost in a triangular pattern. it startled me at first because it obviously wasnt an airplane, at first i thought they were birds, seagulls actually, but they were too bright for so late at night. they traveled east to west pretty much straight over my backyard in about 30 seconds, i could see them, the same bright white color, no darkness to them, until they went out of sight over the trees. no noise, moved smoothly, no jerky motions, all moved in a pattern. i believe in ufos, but i wont jump to conclusions on this. it was a odd set of something moving in the sky and only after i saw them, did i realize what it might be.
